alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 9:32PM CST until February 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Heavy Snow Thursday For Northeast IA, southwest WI... .A winter storm will push rain to a wintry mix across parts of northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin overnight, transitioning to all snow early Thursday morning. Heavy wet snow will then fall for most of the morning hours, shifting east northeast in the afternoon. The storm has slowed up a bit, and shifted more southeast in it`s track...and thus the heavy snow band has shifted more southeast too. The higher amounts and impacts will still be confined to northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow with accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. A wintry mix possible at onset. * WHERE...In Iowa, Allamakee and Fayette Counties. In Wisconsin, Crawford and Richland Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions. &&
